pages.text: $(k)Hello you nosy bastard:3$()$(br)[DATA CORRUPT]$(br)$(k)This section was intetionally$()$(br)[PLEASE SEEK OUT]$(br){White Sempiternal Sanctum}$(br)$(k)left vague to preserve$()$(br)[IN]$(br){The Bumblezone!}$(br)$(k)the mystery of this boss$()$(br)[FOR INFORMATION]$(br)$(k)I haven't fought it as of writing this, but it looks fun!$()
